queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-icinga2-master-1' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-icinga2-master-1' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-icinga2-master-2' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-icinga2-master-2' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-icinga2-web' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-icinga2-web' of kind 'Deployment' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.volumeMounts.name={{tz-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.volumeMounts.name={{tz-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.volumeMounts.name={{tz-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-icinga2-web' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-icinga2-web' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-icinga2-master-2' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-icinga2-master-2' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-icinga2-master-1' of kind 'Deployment' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-icinga2-master-1' of kind 'Deployment' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Berlin' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

metadata.namespace should be defined and not null

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=web has CPU limits
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=volume-init has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=master has CPU limits
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=volume-init has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=master has CPU limits

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=volume-init should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=volume-init should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{volume-init}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{volume-init}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{volume-init}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{volume-init}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{master}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{master}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{web}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{web}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{master}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{master}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.containers.name=web.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=web has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=web does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-1}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{volume-init}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-master-2}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-icinga2-web}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true

queries.description: Container should not use secrets as environment variables

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{web}}.envFrom.secretRef' should be undefined
'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.envFrom.secretRef' should be undefined
'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{master}}.envFrom.secretRef' should be undefined
